message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not comfortable meeting you at $90. How about we compromise at $95? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $92? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
Hi Bob, I understand your hesitation, but I'm not comfortable going any higher than $98. I think that's a fair compromise considering the product's value. What do you think?
I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with $98. Would you be willing to meet me at $96? That's the last offer I'm willing to make.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $99. It's the highest I'm willing to go. If you're not comfortable with that, I'll have to consider other options.
